ping() - Method in interface shared.network.SharedProxyClient
Local
The server calls this method before calling each of the other local ones, to check the client's availability; this method always returns true
ping(String) - Method in interface shared.network.SharedProxyServer
Remote
This method should be called before each of the other remote ones, to check the client's availability

printScore(ArrayList<String>, ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Boolean>) - Method in interface shared.network.SharedProxyClient
Local
When a match has ended, the server calls this method on all players who played that match, providing the names, score and winner flag for each player, as an ArrayList

Remote
When a match ends, the server calls this method on all players who played that match, providing the names, score and winner flag for each player, as an ArrayList
privateO - Variable in class shared.TransferObjects.PlayerT
 
privateTurn - Variable in class shared.TransferObjects.PlayerT
 
ProxyClient - Class in client
This class implements SharedProxyClient and all its methods, making them interact with the correct view components (if they are local) or routing them with the correct parameters to the server (if they are remote)
This class implements the singleton design pattern, having just one instance of it available per JVM; this instance can be accessed through the static class' methods.
ProxyServer - Class in server.connection
This class implements SharedProxyServer and all its methods, making them interact with the correct controller components (if they are local) or routing them with the correct parameters to the client (if they are remote)
This class implements the singleton design pattern, having just one instance of it available per JVM; this instance can be accessed through the static class' methods.
proxyServer - Static variable in class server.threads.MainServer
 
PublicObject - Class in server.executables
